content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'silver_sadlteam1gen2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_sadlteam1gen2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@sadlteam1gen2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

create  EXTERNAL TABLE sor.Catalog 
 	
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Catalog.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_sadlteam1gen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
as 	
 select 
2 as SourceID,
'UUID'  as CatalogID,
b.ActorID,
a.name as Actor,
 a.availabilitydate  as ReleaseDate,
a.Genre,
a.Rating,
cast(ReleaseYear as int) as  AvailabilityYear,
a.StreamingAvailabilityDate as AvailabilityDate,
a.Tier  as MovieTier,
a.Title as MovieTitle,
c.MovieID


 from stg.movies_cosmosdb a
 left join stg.va_actors b on a.name=b.actorname 
 left join stg.va_movies  c on a.title=c.movietitle;
 ;
